org.deeplearning4j.models.word2vec.wordstore

Class BaseLookupCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.models.word2vec.wordstore.BaseLookupCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, VocabCache

    public abstract class BaseLookupCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements VocabCache, java.io.Serializable
    In memory lookup cache for smaller datasets
    See Also:
